description: Returns information about a single query. Requires that you have access to the workgroup in which the query was saved.

parameters.name: NamedQueryId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the query. Use  ListNamedQueries to get query IDs.

nested_items.name: Database
nested_items.description: The database to which the query belongs.

nested_items.name: QueryString
nested_items.description: The SQL statements that make up the query.

nested_items.name: NamedQueryId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the query.

nested_items.name: WorkGroup
nested_items.description: The name of the workgroup that contains the named query.
